member.name: T:Toolkit.FormHide
member.summary: This is a console program, but the console program can not hide its own windows, so in this project, I use a transparent form to replace it.

member.summary: This is the root path of the registry.

member.name: F:Toolkit.FormHide.MainName
member.summary: This is the name of new key.

member.name: M:Toolkit.FormHide.#ctor
member.summary: This is the constructor of this form.

member.name: M:Toolkit.FormHide.AddWindowsContextMenu
member.summary: This sub is used to add the Windows context menu item for PDF file.

member.name: M:Toolkit.FormHide.RemoveWindowsContextMenu
member.summary: This sub is used to remove the Windows context menu item for PDF file.
